mapper.select: select `id`, symbol, high, low, `open`, `close`, dealAmount, dealValue, `dataTime` as `date` from dayK where symbol = #{symbol} order by dataTime desc

select `id`, symbol, high, low, `open`, `close`, dealAmount, dealValue, `dataTime` as `date` from dayK where symbol = #{symbol} and `dataTime` BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} order by dataTime desc
